works.description:
Dear Sirs,

this is Eleonora Ponticelli (Safe N Sound – Anti-piracy Solutions).
I represent the owner of the following copyrighted work:

Copyrighted work which is being infringed:

NMB038 – Noir & Richard Davis – Found Out

Authorization from the owner:
The undersigned RENE KRISTENSEN is the owner of the following record labels
NOIR MUSIC then even the concerning catalogue.
With this e-mail I authorize Eleonora Ponticelli (Safe N Sound)  to work on  
behalf of myself and all of my own brands.
This authorization concern everything is useful to stop the illegal music  
sharing.
René Kristensen – Owner – Noir Music – noir@noir-music.com
